feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:22 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm along the lakeshore. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 early in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
